titleStmt.title: Of the Christian Sabboth a godlye treatise of Mayster Iulius of Milayne / translated out of Italian into English, by Thomas Langley.
titleStmt.author: Julius, of Milan.
Langley, Thomas, d. 1581.

publicationStmt.publisher: In Paules churcheyarde, at the signe of the George by Willyam Reddell,

notesStmt.note: Place of publication and publisher from colophon.
Imperfect: tightly bound, with some loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Lambeth Palace Library.
